https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1buRxMpZFx5fQrSMzOxCYbWEm1O.jpg For forty years, Esfandiar has been unconcernedly preparing corpses for the journey to their final resting place. One day, whilst preparing a burial service, he's taken ill. Might he too be mortal? Bitter Dream
